verse: पादाश्रितानां च समस्तचौरम् श्रीराधिकाया हृदयस्य चौरम् | नीलाम्बुजश्यामलकांतिचौरम् चौराग्रगण्यं पुरुषं नमामि ॥

words.पादाश्रितानां: of those who take refuge at the feet

overall_meaning: I bow to the person who is foremost among all thieves of those who take refuge at the feet, the thief of all thieves, the thief of goddess Lakshmi's Radha's heart, the thief of the blue lotus-like dark complexion, and the foremost thief.
